学校大门还有40秒打开.Translation: The school gate will open in 40 seconds.

等待30秒迷宫的栅栏门打开.Translation: Wait 30 seconds for the maze gate to open.

走廊被东西挡住了，从教室里绕过去吧.Translation: The corridor is blocked; go around from the classroom.

等待30秒教室后门打开.Translation: Wait 30 seconds for the classroom back door to open.

等待30秒舞蹈室的门打开.Translation: Wait 30 seconds for the dance room door to open.

图书室的门还有10秒打开.Translation: The library door will open in 10 seconds.

图书室的后门在25秒后打开.Translation: The back door of the library will open in 25 seconds.

等待10秒教室前门打开.Translation: Wait 10 seconds for the classroom front door to open.

奇怪，门怎么锁住了，我们再想想其他办法.Translation: Strange, why is the door locked? Let's think of another way.

那面墙好像坏了，我们看看能不能给它推倒.Translation: That wall seems broken; let's see if we can push it down.

电梯门还有30秒打开.Translation: The elevator door will open in 30 seconds.

舞台将在10秒后开启.Translation: The stage will open in 10 seconds.

找到九名少女开启电梯.Translation: Find nine girls to activate the elevator.

舞台将在55秒后开启.Translation: The stage will open in 55 seconds.

这是我的第一张地图,重置GO时期的少女歌剧.Translation: This is my first map, a reset of the CSGO era of the Revue Starlight.

如遇到地图bug，请到我创意工坊下留言.Translation: If you encounter any map bugs, please leave a message in my Steam workshop page.

建议打开地图音乐体验更佳.Translation: It is recommended to turn on the map music for a better experience. (snd_musicvolume 0.5)

奇怪,学校大门怎么进不去,快进左边的小树林.Translation: Strange, why can't we enter the school gate? Quick, go into the small bushes on the left.

打碎了所有长颈鹿,守住30秒等待星星上升.Translation: Smashed all the giraffes, hold for 30 seconds and wait for the stars to rise.

守住20秒等待平台下降.Translation: Hold for 20 seconds and wait for the platform to descend.

僵尸将在3秒后传送.Translation: Zombies will be teleported in 3 seconds.

我们需要打碎两边水晶才能继续前进.Translation: We need to smash the crystals on both sides to proceed.

我们成功了!守住15秒等待道路出现.Translation: We did it! Hold for 15 seconds and wait for the road to appear.

路被堵住了，守住20秒检查一下哪道门是正确的门.Translation: The path is blocked; hold for 20 seconds and check which door is the correct one.

又来?继续守住20秒寻找正确的门.Translation: Again? Continue to hold for 20 seconds to find the correct door.

快站到架子下面去守住15秒.Translation: Quick, stand under the rack and hold for 15 seconds.

AFK将在5秒后传送.Translation: AFK will be teleported in 5 seconds.

平台将在15秒后开始移动，注意其他平台上的僵尸.Translation: The platform will start moving in 15 seconds; watch out for zombies on other platforms.

梯子开放了，快走！.Translation: The ladder is open; hurry up!

AFK3秒后传送.Translation: AFK will be teleported in 3 seconds.

星星马上就要消失了，快走!.Translation: The stars are about to disappear; hurry up!

AFK将在15秒后开启.Translation: AFK will be teleported in 15 seconds.

鸟笼将在5秒后上升.Translation: The birdcage will rise in 5 seconds.

第一道铁门还有20秒打开.Translation: The first iron gate will open in 20 seconds.

第二道铁门还有20秒打开.Translation: The second iron gate will open in 20 seconds.

第三道铁门还有5秒打开.Translation: The third iron gate will open in 5 seconds.

站在鸟笼里等待30秒传送.Translation: Stand in the birdcage and wait for 30 seconds to teleport.

AFK将在3秒后开启.Translation: AFK will be activated in 3 seconds.

检测到没有达成真结局解锁条件.Translation: Detected that the conditions for unlocking the true ending have not been met.

将开启假结局.......Translation: A false ending will be activated......

20秒后将开启跳刀.Translation: Start dodging laser blades in 20 seconds.

即将重启舞台.......Translation: The stage is about to restart......
